snippet.title: Space Prison - Early Access Release date teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1865930/Space_Prison/?utm_source=Releasedateteaser&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=&utm_content=

Space Prison will launch in Early Access on April 10, 2024, on Steam!

Space Prison is a tactical survival game with turn-based brawls & RPG-social mechanics. Survive the galaxy's toughest prison and rise to the top of a gang! Explore, fight, befriend, trade & craft to escape but don't let the system break you, as death is not an excuse for a shorter sentence!

Space Prison social media:
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/9aCaaZzZxj
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/Wooden_Alien
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WoodenAlienGames/
- Newsletter: https://bit.ly/Newsletter_Space_Prison

-------------------------------------------
Development studio:
Wooden Alien
https://www.woodenalien.com

Publisher:
Firesquid
https://firesquid.games/
-------------------------------------------
Trailer maker:
Paweł Piskorski
Firesquid
-------------------------------------------
Voice over
Courtney Lucien
-------------------------------------------
Music
After the Blackout, Kevin Maison
